comment: "The editors are always very professional, but the finance department does not communicate well (often will not respond to multiple inquiries about payment) and normally very late in payment. They have claimed that they were going to send me a check the following week, and then not followed through. In this case, it's been 50+ days and still haven't been paid, and the finance dept claims that they haven't paid freelancers because they're "waiting on a grant" to come through at the end of the month."
